Interface IProjectServices

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectController
public interface IProjectServices
Defines services for managing and retrieving Project entities:
  • Retrieve projects eligible for a user
  • Retrieve projects created by a manager or view all projects
  • Lookup, add, and remove projects
  • Filter a set of projects by neighborhood and flat type
Since:
24/4/2025
Version:
final
Author:
FCSH Group 2

  • Method Details

    • getEligibleProjects

      Map<String,Project> getEligibleProjects(User user)
      Retrieves only those projects that are visible and for which the given user meets eligibility criteria.
      Parameters:
      user - the User (Applicant, Officer, or Manager) to check eligibility for
      Returns:
      map of project names to Project objects the user is eligible to view

    • managerGetProjects

      Map<String,Project> managerGetProjects(Manager manager)
      Retrieves all projects created by the specified manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the Manager whose projects to fetch
      Returns:
      map of project names to Project objects managed by this manager

    • managerViewAllProjects

      Map<String,Project> managerViewAllProjects()
      Retrieves every project in the system, regardless of manager.
      Returns:
      map of all project names to their Project objects

    • getProject

      Project getProject(String projectName)
      Looks up a single project by its unique name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Project object if found; null otherwise

    • addProject

      boolean addProject(Project project)
      Adds a new project to the system.
      Parameters:
      project - the Project object to add
      Returns:
      true if successfully added; false if a project with the same name already exists

    • removeProject

      boolean removeProject(String projectName)
      Removes an existing project by its name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project to remove
      Returns:
      true if successfully removed; false otherwise

    • filterProjects

      HashMap<String,Project> filterProjects(String neighborhood, String flatType, Map<String,Project> projects)
      Filters a given collection of projects by neighborhood and flat type.
      Parameters:
      neighborhood - the neighborhood to match (empty for no filter)
      flatType - the flat type to match (empty for no filter)
      projects - the map of project names to Project objects to filter
      Returns:
      a new HashMap of project names to Project objects that match the criteria
